idea-plugin.name: Project Structure Creator
idea-plugin.description:
Project Structure Creator is a simple IntelliJ/Android Studio plugin that automatically generates a clean folder hierarchy inside your Android project â€” directly next to your MainActivity (in the same package).
It helps you quickly scaffold a standard structure like: - data/ - domain/ - ui/ - screens/ - components/
Perfect for initializing new Android modules or organizing feature-based architecture. Compatible with IntelliJ IDEA and Android Studio 2024+.
idea-plugin.change-notes: Version 1.0.0: - Added automatic folder generation near MainActivity.kt. - Supports Kotlin, Java, and Kotlin+Java source sets. - Works with Android Studio 2024+ and IntelliJ 2024.2+.
